channel.title: Death glitch
channel.description:
Well, I'm re-writing some/most of TestScape, and I can't find this littlest glitch (don't laugh).
when a user logs in for the first time, it says "oh dear your dead!"
How would I fix this.
I have tried player.java, and client.java (youdied())
Any ideas?

item.title: Death glitch
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Umm, try player.java i believe that would mean there HP is not set to the corect amount. Its one of the these 3 files player.java, playerhandler.java or playersave.java

P.S. dont hold me on this cause it could also be a missing method. (my friend tried to help me remove some methods and move them and forgot to put one in, and it caused that.) but i dont remember where those methods are anymore.

Read full topic
